name: THE FAIR FOOD NETWORK
description: Promoting policies for sustainable agriculture and public health.
sampleDescriptions: Lobbying related to USDA's Food Insecurity Nutrition Incentive Program (FINI). Spoke with members of House and Senate about the merits of reauthorizing the Food Insecurity Nutrition Incentive program
Discussing the results of Food Insecurity Nutrition Incentive grants in states around the country and providing recommendations for reauthorization and improvement of the program.
Speaking with members of the House and Senate Agriculture Committees about the Food Insecurity Nutrition Incentive program in the 2018 farm bill.

Providing information to members of the House and Senate on the results of the FINI program grants and feedback from organizations on the proposed changes to the program in the pending 2018 farm bill.
